title: Chris Burnell
tagline:
Hey, my name’s Chris,
and I’m ravenous for CSS.
lede: I’m Chris Burnell, a Senior Front End Developer for Squiz, Organiser for London Web Standards, Dungeon Master, and rabbit-hole deep-diver living in London, England but originally from Halifax (NS), Canada. This is where I think, write, and share my passion for the web.
